remarks: Associativity of the multiplication of two NxN matrices with an N-dimensional vector.  (Contributed by AV, 9-Feb-2019.)  (Revised by AV, 25-Feb-2019.)  (Proof shortened by AV, 22-Jul-2019.)
statement:
1mavmul.a $e |- A = ( N Mat R ) $.
1mavmul.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
1mavmul.t $e |- .x. = ( R maVecMul <. N , N >. ) $.
1mavmul.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) $.
1mavmul.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. Fin ) $.
1mavmul.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. ( B ^m N ) ) $.
mavmulass.m $e |- .X. = ( R maMul <. N , N , N >. ) $.
mavmulass.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( Base ` A ) ) $.
mavmulass.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. ( Base ` A ) ) $.
mavmulass $p |- ( ph -> ( ( X .X. Z ) .x. Y ) = ( X .x. ( Z .x. Y ) ) ) $.
